#summary The following provides specific instructions for running the IndoPacificDB Working Group FIMS

= Getting Started with the Biocode FIMS Validator (For the IndoPacificDB Working Group) =

STEP 1: Get the latest copy of the Indo Pacific Spreadsheet Template by using the Biocode-FIMS [http://biscicol.org/biocode-fims/templates.jsp Template Generator]

STEP 2: Fill in your data according to the instructions on the Instructions Tab from your spreadsheet.

STEP 3: Validate and upload data using one of the following methods

  * Biocode-FIMS [http://biscicol.org/biocode-fims web application] 
  * Using the [https://code.google.com/p/biocode-fims/wiki/GeneiousPluginInstallation Biocode FIMS Geneious Plugin] 

STEP 4: Loading Data

  * Use the "DEMOH" dataset code to test validation and upload functionality
  * To upload actual data, obtain a username/password by emailing eric.darvish@gmail.com
